channel.title: How do you become/do
channel.description: how do you become a adminastrator and how do you put a picture underneath your name? (when you post it says blackcat then underneath that some people have a picture how do you put one in?

item.title: How do you become/do
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:9, topic:15556”][quote author=Algas link=topic=23203.msg261104#msg261104 date=1158831617]

Lol…

The pictures are awards they have won, and being an admin is something I dont think you need to worry about since it’s not gonna happen.

I would not say so. I mean look at me… I remember posting something to kaitnieks.com where I asked what is OSi and where can I get it? I made atleast 2 topics about it. I was the uber leecher/noob back then. My favourite place was scar runescape script requests and well you know ;D

If you really set your goal to become an admin and fight for it till the end I believe you will become an admin someday. But it sure will take time.

And we dont have avatars on these forums so those pics you see are somesort of awards. Place your mouse over them and you see where they have got them. For example I have a pikachu award which means I am either a mod or an admin.
[/quote] believe it or not i was wondering the same thing…how do you become an admin… but you didnt really answer the question "how :underline: do :underline: you become an admin[br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 02:27:52 PM[/size][hr]oh and blackcat i think it also sometimes depends on how much “rep” you have. “rep” stands for reputation btw[/quote]

Reputation is just something that is here for “fun”. For having high reputation count doesent mean anything.

And how did I became admin you ask? Well I am an admin here since I was an admin on kaitnieks.com. Why I first became a mod on kaitnieks.com? That is something that I never really figured out. For some strange reason I got a pm from kaitnieks asking me if I wanted to becoma a moderator. I still believe there were better options but well here I am now.

And how do you become an admin or a moderator? First advice: Read the rules and obey them. Since 99% of the case spammer or somthing like that wont become a moderator. Second advice: contribute to community in a way you can. I mean I have never been a programmer or anything. Still people are asking me questions about private servers and such. I will be honest when I say that I dont understand s*it about them

Just contribute to the community. And get respect from other users from your posts and behaving. Be mature.

But last thing to do is to start pming admins and asking to become moderator/admin. I mean mopar will ask you if he wants you to out team. (oh we are a team now?)

Read full topic

If you really set your goal to become an admin and fight for it till the end I believe you will become an admin someday. But it sure will take time.

And we dont have avatars on these forums so those pics you see are somesort of awards. Place your mouse over them and you see where they have got them. For example I have a pikachu award which means I am either a mod or an admin.[/quote] believe it or not i was wondering the same thing…how do you become an admin… but you didnt really answer the question "how :underline: do :underline: you become an admin[br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 02:27:52 PM[/size][hr]oh and blackcat i think it also sometimes depends on how much “rep” you have. “rep” stands for reputation btw

Read full topic

I would not say so. I mean look at me… I remember posting something to kaitnieks.com where I asked what is OSi and where can I get it? I made atleast 2 topics about it. I was the uber leecher/noob back then. My favourite place was scar runescape script requests and well you know ;D

If you really set your goal to become an admin and fight for it till the end I believe you will become an admin someday. But it sure will take time.
